info.description: API for Sun Ready project management system
info.title: Sun Ready API

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token
Register a new user with email and password

get.description: Get a list of all companies with optional filtering

parameters.description: Filter by referred by user ID
parameters.name: referred_by_user_id

post.description: Create a new company with the provided details
Creates a new company and migrates the main user and their descendants to it

get.description: Get all companies without pagination with optional filtering

parameters.description: Filter by referred by user ID
parameters.name: referred_by_user_id

get.description: Get a company by its slug
Get a company by its ID
Get a list of all deals with pagination

post.description: Create a new deal with the provided details

get.description: Get a list of deals for a specific company
Get a list of signed deals for a company
Get a deal by its UUID
Get a deal by its ID
Get a list of all leads with pagination

post.description: Create a new lead with the provided details

get.description: Get a list of leads for a specific company
Get a lead by its ID

put.description: Update the state of a lead

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
